Description: JOB DESCRIPTIONKey Responsibilities & Authority :- Inspect the received machines (upon-arrival inspection) and/or the goods to be delivered (Pre-delivery inspection)- Install and run the machines- Apply the equipment upgrades- Perform the in-service (present the machine operational parts to the user)- Apply the Manufacturer’s preventive maintenance measures according to preset schedules agreed on with the Customer- Repair the out-of-control equipment, and collect the Labour charge and the price of the used spare parts- Decide on stocking the frequently needed spare parts- Sell and execute the service contracts- Generate and communicate sales leads to the sales team and report on Customers’ technical problems experienced with competitorsKey Performance Indicators:- Achieved Turnover (from the sold service contracts, and labour charge) versus plan                                                                                                        - Timely installations, upgrades and completed preventive maintenance compared to plan and the Manufacturer’s recommendations                     - Escalation reports to the Supervisor on non-completed jobs with reason(s)                                                                                                         - Generated Sales Leads communicated to the Sales team and feedback on competitors’ maintenance and technical shortfalls           - Customers’ feedback on delivered in-serviceJob Details
